definition: to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: We had better take less than 65 grammes fat every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天摄入的脂肪量最好不要超过65克。

sentences.english: This rise has been paralleled by an increase in fluid milk intake.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病发病率的上升是与液体奶摄入量的增加并行的。

sentences.english: Also, try to limit your intake of caffeine and alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 你也要限制你的咖啡因和酒精的摄入量。

sentences.english: Some experts believe it is excessive intake of dairy foods, especially the cheese-related.
sentences.chinese: 有专家认为它与过多摄入乳类食品，尤其是奶酪有关。

sentences.english: Excessive absorption or lack of halogen group elements could result in disease.
sentences.chinese: 过量摄入或缺乏卤族元素，都可能导致疾病的发生。

sentences.english: Try to keep two servings per day.
sentences.chinese: 尝试每一天保持有两份的摄入。
停止摄入高脂肪的动物蛋白质。

sentences.english: The result of this rule for Okinawans is that they end up eating fewer calories than most people.
sentences.chinese: 这一方法使冲绳岛民摄入的卡路里比大多数人要少。

sentences.english: The fiber and protein boost allows a small serving with great contentment.
sentences.chinese: 摄入一点点纤维素和蛋白质，就会得到大大的满足。

sentences.english: In typical ingestion scenarios, you will have a number of data sources to process.
sentences.chinese: 在典型的摄入场景中，您会有大量的数据源要处理。

sentences.english: How do you feel about counting calories?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么看计算卡路里摄入量？

sentences.english: "The most powerful determinant of your dietary intake is your energy expenditure, " says Steven Gortmaker, who heads Harvard's Prevention Research Center on Nutrition and Physical Activity.
sentences.chinese: 决定饮食摄入量的最大因素是你的能量消耗。

sentences.english: The more sodium you consume, the more potassium you need to counteract this effect.
sentences.chinese: 你摄入的钠越多，就需要更多的钾来中和。

sentences.english: Calcium and other nutrients intakes we re assessed by a food-frequency method.
sentences.chinese: 钙和其它营养素摄入量用食物频率法评价。

sentences.english: It is a combination of short ram air intake and cold air intake system.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个相结合的短冷冲压空气摄入和进气系统。

sentences.english: Keep a count of your calorie intake for one week.
sentences.chinese: 把你一星期的热卡摄入量记录下来。

definition: to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
